summary:
\"Lord Randar Must Die\"
=====================
7 custom maps. Help a brave knight avenge his family.
descriptionHtml:
\"Lord Randar Must Die\" 
=================== 
Once upon a time there was a hero. That hero was you, The Dragonborn. Then one day the Dragonborn stumbled upon a brave knight called Bevil. 
Now Bevil had had a bad time. His family had all been killed by a nasty dragon Priest. Bevil asked for the Dragonborns\'s help, \"We\'re here to avenge my family...\". The Dragonborn kindly obliged, and they all lived happily ever after... 

Lord Randar Must Die features 
========================= 
Maps:- 
Dread Gorge Entrance 
Dread Gorge 
Dread Gorge Tower 
Dread Gorge Tunnels 
Randar\'s Ravine 
Randar\'s Gatehouse 
Lord Randar\'s Tomb 

Follower and quest giver Bevil 
Bevil\'s lusty cohorts, Selva and Vala 
Word Walls at three locations during your quest to improve your Thu\'um 
Nordic puzzle pillars to thwart your advance 

No DLC required, just vanilla Skyrim and a couple of hours of your time! 

Location:- Go to Riverwood and head for the southern cliff path behind the village (Cave Marker) 

***Important Note***
If you take Bevil as your follower, you essentially get 3 followers.
If you don\'t like/want to, just take his quest and either run the dungeon with your own/no follower.

Yol - Toor - SHUL!
author: tension69
